channel.title: My various open source projects
channel.description:
I thought I'd go ahead just post some of my projects I'm working/have worked on so that anyone interested can contribute.
[ul][li] [b]Borderless-Gaming[/b] - Play your favorite games in a borderless window; no more time consuming alt-tabs.[C#] https://github.com/Codeusa/Borderless-Gaming
[b]Summit-Client [/b] - A windows game launcher for RSPS [C#] https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,659895.msg4412480.html#new
[b]SpeedTest-Faker[/b] - Fake your speedtest results with the power of python! [Python] https://github.com/Codeusa/SpeedTest-Faker
[b]Sounds-Of-Files[/b] - Generated a unique sound based off the length of a file [Java] https://github.com/Codeusa/Sounds-Of-Files
[b]Drunken-JAR-Loader[/b] - A basic class loader to remotely execute a Jar in a new frame [Java] https://github.com/Codeusa/Drunken-JAR-Loader
[b]Litecoin-Watcher[/b] - Track stats of litecoins in real time. [Java] https://github.com/Codeusa/Litecoin-Watcher
[b]GEM[/b] - GEM is a game graphic modification for games [C++] http://gem.codeusa.net/
[b]Steam-Grid-View-Image-Dumper[/b] - Will download the grid view images of games based on the profile of a user [Python] https://github.com/Codeusa/Steam-Grid-View-Image-Dumper [/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[u][i][b]Soon to be opensource:[/b][/i][/u]
[ul][li][b]Jvine[/b] - an online Java app for downloading Vines and converting them to animated gifs. [Java] http://jvine.codeusa.net/
[b]QTBot[/b] - an artificial Skype intelligence used for spicing up conversations or giving you access to awesome functions on the fly [Python] http://qtbot.net/
[b]Song-Masher[/b] - Generate cool mixes with one click [Java] http://andrew.codeusa.net/post/69559054876/i-couldnt-decide-what-i-wanted-to-listen-to-while [/li] [li][/li][/ul]
While not open source i've made some tools for various gaming communities to help out: http://steamcommunity.com/app/200260/discussions/0/810938810707303888/ - Will patch Arkham City and Asylum to be compatible with steamworks
http://andrew.codeusa.net/post/71334533495/clive-barkers-jericho-fixer - A patcher for Jericho so it actually runs
http://steamcommunity.com/app/218620/discussions/0/864976837949903652/ - a special build of GEM that contains mod tools for extracting PAYDAY 2 game assets.
Fork, learn, commit. Any feedback is appreciated

item.title: My various open source projects
item.dc:creator: @Codeusa11 Codeusa11
item.description:
@Codeusa11 wrote:

thiefmn6092:

any source code anywhere for GEM?

Each version should contain specific code for the actual shaders and what not, I lost my code for the d3d9, but it works like any other proxy and overrides & calls certain functions when used.

Read full topic

item.title: My various open source projects
item.dc:creator: @Codeusa11 Codeusa11
item.description:
@Codeusa11 wrote:

I thought I’d go ahead just post some of my projects I’m working/have worked on so that anyone interested can contribute.

[ul][li]
Borderless-Gaming - Play your favorite games in a borderless window; no more time consuming alt-tabs.[C#]
https://github.com/Codeusa/Borderless-Gaming

Summit-Client - A windows game launcher for RSPS [C#]
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,659895.msg4412480.html#new

SpeedTest-Faker - Fake your speedtest results with the power of python! [Python]
https://github.com/Codeusa/SpeedTest-Faker

Sounds-Of-Files - Generated a unique sound based off the length of a file [Java]
https://github.com/Codeusa/Sounds-Of-Files

Drunken-JAR-Loader - A basic class loader to remotely execute a Jar in a new frame [Java]
https://github.com/Codeusa/Drunken-JAR-Loader

Litecoin-Watcher - Track stats of litecoins in real time. [Java]
https://github.com/Codeusa/Litecoin-Watcher

GEM - GEM is a game graphic modification for games [C++]
http://gem.codeusa.net/

Steam-Grid-View-Image-Dumper - Will download the grid view images of games based on the profile of a user [Python]
https://github.com/Codeusa/Steam-Grid-View-Image-Dumper [/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Soon to be opensource:

[ul][li]Jvine - an online Java app for downloading Vines and converting them to animated gifs. [Java]
http://jvine.codeusa.net/

QTBot - an artificial Skype intelligence used for spicing up conversations or giving you access to awesome functions on the fly [Python]
http://qtbot.net/

Song-Masher - Generate cool mixes with one click [Java]
http://andrew.codeusa.net/post/69559054876/i-couldnt-decide-what-i-wanted-to-listen-to-while
[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

While not open source i’ve made some tools for various gaming communities to help out:
http://steamcommunity.com/app/200260/discussions/0/810938810707303888/ - Will patch Arkham City and Asylum to be compatible with steamworks

http://andrew.codeusa.net/post/71334533495/clive-barkers-jericho-fixer - A patcher for Jericho so it actually runs

http://steamcommunity.com/app/218620/discussions/0/864976837949903652/ - a special build of GEM that contains mod tools for extracting PAYDAY 2 game assets.

Fork, learn, commit. Any feedback is appreciated
